errors.voiceChannel: You must be in a voice channel to do this!

help.title: Command Usage
help.usage:
**-music play <query/link>** : *Plays music*

**-music stop** : *Stops all music and clears the queue*

**-music pause** : *Pauses music*

**-music resume** : *Resumes the music*

**-music playing** : *Displays the currently playing song*

**-music skip** : *Skips a song in the queue*

**-music volume** : *Sets the music volume*

**-music queue** : *Displays the queue*

**-music remove [number]** : *Removes a song from the queue*

**-music lyrics [song name]** : *Pulls up the lyrics for a song, or the lyrics for the currently playing song*

**-music loop** : *Loops the currently playing song*

volume.title: üéµ Volume Changed
volume.description: The volume has been set to %percent%%

end.title: You have reached the end of the queue!
end.description: To stop the music, run -music stop

remove.title: Song Removed
remove.description: [%song%](%url%) has been removed from the queue
